name: Sunsilk Soft & Smooth Conditioner
description:
Sunsilk Nourishing Soft & Smooth Conditioner ensures that the hair retains its natural softness. Its unique blend of 5 natural oils and revolutionary conditioner technology act as softening and shaping agents to keep hair manageable. For silky, smooth hair from the first wash. Sunsilk Nourishing Soft & Smooth conditioner is now New Outside & wow Inside. Its most joyful yellow shampoo pack comes with an easy to handle grip.
 *Images for illustration purposes only. Product received may vary.
